items.title: Construct 2 - Your first game.
items.headline: Game creation without needing to know any code.
objectives_summary: Use Construct 2 at introductory level.
Build a basic PC game.
Learn basic game design and concepts.

items.title: Making a Card Game from Scratch in Adobe Photoshop
items.headline: Make a card game you can play with family and friends!
objectives_summary: Create a card game from scratch
Build a complete deck of cards
Create specific rules for a card game

items.title: Learn C++ Game Design with Lynar Moon Engine
items.headline: Learn how to use the "Lynar Moon Engine" by using CLion (IDE) and C/C++.
objectives_summary: You will be able to create your own 2D game within 2 hours.
You will be able to release your game as setup application.

items.title: Create a modular dungeon in Unity
items.headline: Modular level design for games
objectives_summary: Modular level design
Snapping techniques for object placement
Quick ways to create dungeon layouts

items.title: Intro to Game Design (Game Jam)
items.headline: Introduction to Game Design for absolute beginners and people who want to participate in the HisarCS Game Jam.
objectives_summary: Game design
Pixel Asset Design
Game Art

items.title: How to get started in game development

visible_instructors.title: Game Developers Republic
visible_instructors.job_title: Creating your own game, can be an exciting adventure!
visible_instructors.name: Game Developers

items.headline: Beginners guide to game development, game art, & game design.
objectives_summary: In this video series, we'll cover all the things you need to know to start your journey into game development.

items.title: Build Your First Unity Project for Game Development
items.headline: Learn how to create video games using Unity, the world-leading free-to-use game development tool.
objectives_summary: Build a solid foundation for game design and game development that will help you build your own games.
Create playable game projects - good for your portfolio, or just for your own sense of achievement.
Develop highly transferable coding problem solving skills.

items.title: 2D Character Art School: How to Draw Characters
items.headline: Learn how to draw quickly your own Beat 'em up Game Character that can stand up as professional work.
objectives_summary: Learn how to draw your own character and use it in games, art, comic books...
Design your own character
Edit and use ready template

items.title: Design & Criação de Personagens
items.headline: Idéias, Conceitos e o Processo de Produção para Criadores de Personagens
objectives_summary: Criar Personagens para Histórias, Animações, Games, Quadrinhos ou Publicidade
Todo o processo de Criação de Personagens (Character Design), do briefing to cliente à entrega do ModelSheet
Dicas e Conceitos para deixar qualquer tipo de Desenho mais dinâmico e interessante

items.title: Pixel Art para games de forma descomplicada
items.headline: Deixe seus games com um visual incrível e profissional, aprenda os principais conceitos, técnicas e estilos de pixel art
objectives_summary: Nesse curso você aprenderá os fundamentos para criar pixel art
Criar personagens e animá-los
Criar cenários e objetos de cena

items.title: Curso Completo de Ilustração com Clip Studio Paint
items.headline: Aprenda as Ferramentas de Ilustração do Clip Studio Paint
objectives_summary: Criar Ilustrações para Internet e Impressão utilizando somente o Clip Studio Paint
Profissionais poderão incorporar o Clip Studio Paint num Workflow de trabalho, substituindo o Photoshop
Aprender o meu Processo de Produção para criar Ilustração no Computador (Passo-a-Passo)

items.title: Der komplette Blender-Kurs für Unity: Lerne 3D-Modellierung
items.headline: Entwickle Deine eigenen Game Assets und Modelle für Spiele-Entwicklung in Unity mit diesen Tutorials
objectives_summary: Spielinhalte mit Blender erstellen und in Unity verwenden
Verschiedene Verfahren der 3D-Modellierung anwenden
Spielobjekte mit Materialien und Bildtexturen versehen

items.title: Aprenda a Criar Matte Paintings Utilizando Photoshop
items.headline: Matte Painting e Design de Cenários Realistas para Games e Filmes Utilizando Photoshop
objectives_summary: Criar Concepts e Matte Paintings de cenários

items.title: Curso de diseño narrativo y guión de videojuegos

visible_instructors.title: Ángel Codón Ramos
visible_instructors.job_title: Senior Game & Narrative Designer / Experto en UXD
visible_instructors.name: Ángel

items.headline: Aprende y domina los conceptos del diseño narrativo y del guión de videojuegos como un verdadero profesional.
objectives_summary: Tener una clara idea de qué significa el diseño narrativo en un juego y conocer técnicas profesionales sobre el mismo, así como de las diferencias entre el guión de un videojuego y el de otros productos audiovisuales.

items.title: Der komplette Blender Kurs - Erstelle hochwertige 3D Modelle

visible_instructors.title: Jannick Leismann
visible_instructors.job_title: .NET | C# | ASP.NET Core | Unity | Webentwicklung | Angular
visible_instructors.name: Jannick

items.headline: Lerne 3D Modellierung, Texturierung und Animation in Blender
objectives_summary: Lerne die Grundlagen der 3D Modellierung in Blender
Lerne wie man Objekt per Hand Texturiert
Objekte durch Animation zum Leben erwecken

items.title: Pipeline Completo Arte 3D para Games
items.headline: Criação de um Asset no padrão de games AAA
objectives_summary: Como criar Arte 3D para games - O processo completo
Modelagem, Texturização e Apresentação de modelos RealTime
